sentences.en: ...a nationwide system of aqueducts to carry water to the arid parts of this country.
sentences.cn: ...一个将水输送到该国干旱地区的全国性输水系统。

sentences.en: Modern aqueduct systems employ cast iron or steel.
sentences.cn: 现代输水管道多用钢、铁制成.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the diagnosis, hearing and treatment of large vestibular aqueduct syndrome ( LVAS ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨大前庭导水管综合征 ( LVAS ) 的诊断 、 听力学表现及治疗.

sentences.en: Quiz case 2 vestibular aqueduct syndrome ( LVAS ).
The ancient aqueduct stood out against the clear sky.
sentences.cn: 古代留下来的高架渠在蓝天的映衬之下十分夺目。

sentences.en: The aqueduct of the project is the overhead water transporting construction which across rivers and roads.
sentences.cn: 渡槽是南水北调工程中跨越河流和道路等的架空输水建筑物.

sentences.en: The los angeles aqueduct winds like an immense snake along the base of the mountains.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶引水渠像一条蜿蜒于山底的巨蟒.

sentences.en: The mass extends anteriorly and there is compression of Sylvius aqueduct . This compression causes significant hydrocephalus.
sentences.cn: 肿块向前延伸,压迫中脑导水管,压迫中脑导水管, 导致脑积水.

sentences.en: There is an aqueduct underneath the new house.
sentences.cn: 这座新房子底下有个导水管.

sentences.en: These tiny debris - flow deposits formed on freshly excavated embankments of the California Aqueduct.
sentences.cn: 这些细小的泥石流沉积是在新开凿的加利福尼亚渠的大堤上形成的.

sentences.en: This paper reports 23 cases of the large vestibular aqueduct syndrome.
sentences.cn: 报告23例大前庭导水管综合征.

sentences.en: We thought that it's easy to find the aqueduct water path.
sentences.cn: 大家都认为只要沿着小溪走就可以很容易找到太华峡谷.

trans.tran_cn: 沟渠，引水渠，导水管，高架渠
trans.tran_en: An aqueduct is a large pipe or canal that carries a water supply to a city or a farming area
